header.title: Open Source Software
header.subtitle: A collection of my open source projects, available for collaboration and use on GitHub.

items.title: Project Deskmate: AI ServiceNow Agent
items.description: A proof-of-concept demonstrating how a Generative AI agent can diagnose user issues, create detailed tickets, and slash resolution times in ServiceNow.

items.title: NoteTaker AI: Intelligent Note-Taking
items.description: A privacy-first, offline-capable, intelligent workspace that uses generative AI to transcribe, summarize, and organize your notes.
